Project.name: Airboost
Project.description: High-performance SQLite cache that turns your Airtable into a blazing-fast, always-available API.

Metadata.title: Airboost — High-Performance SQLite Cache for Airtable
Metadata.description: 240x faster queries, zero-downtime updates, and real-time webhooks. Open-source SQLite cache that turns your Airtable into a blazing-fast, always-available API. Works with Next.js, Nuxt, Remix, WeWeb, Webflow, and more.
Metadata.ogDescription: Open-source SQLite caching proxy for Airtable. Sub-millisecond queries, zero downtime, real-time sync. Deploy in 60 seconds.

Hero.description: Stop worrying about Airtable's rate limits and latency. Airboost caches your data in SQLite for sub-millisecond queries, unlimited throughput, and zero downtime.

WorksWith.title: Works with any frontend — code or no-code

Features.title: Everything you need
Features.subtitle: Built for developers who love Airtable's flexibility but need production-grade performance.

blazingFast.name: Sub-ms Queries
blazingFast.description: Sub-millisecond queries powered by SQLite. Your data served instantly, no more waiting for the Airtable API.

zeroDowntime.name: Zero Downtime
zeroDowntime.description: Atomic dual-database swap strategy ensures your API never goes down, even during cache refreshes.

selfHosted.name: Self-Hosted
selfHosted.description: Your data stays on your infrastructure. Deploy anywhere Bun runs — Railway, Fly.io, Docker, or any VPS.

realTimeSync.name: Real-time Sync
realTimeSync.description: Three sync modes to fit your needs — automatic polling, real-time webhooks, or manual control. Your data stays fresh, your way.

attachments.name: Attachment Support
attachments.description: Automatic downloading and serving of Airtable file attachments with deduplication and local caching.

typeSafety.name: Type Safety
typeSafety.description: Auto-generated TypeScript type definitions from your Airtable schema. Full type safety for your frontend.

QuickStart.title: Get started in seconds
QuickStart.subtitle: Works with your existing Airtable data — no migration needed.

Deploy.title: Ready to fly?
Deploy.subtitle: Get your own instance running in 60 seconds. One-click deploy with automatic HTTPS and zero-downtime deployments.
Deploy.alternative: Or self-host anywhere Bun runs — Fly.io, Render, DigitalOcean, any VPS.
Deploy.referralNote: Deploying via this link supports the project at no extra cost to you.

metadata.title: How Airboost Works — Architecture, Benchmarks & Sync Modes
metadata.description: Learn how Airboost achieves 240x faster queries with dual-database architecture, real-time sync, and sub-millisecond SQLite caching for Airtable.

hero.title: How Airboost Works
hero.subtitle: A transparent look at the architecture and real-world performance behind Airboost.

benchmarks.title: Real-World Benchmarks
benchmarks.subtitle: Measured on a production deployment with 19 Airtable tables, across 4 query scenarios.

architecture.title: Dual-Database Architecture
architecture.subtitle: Zero downtime, guaranteed. Here's how.
architecture.step1Description: All API requests hit the active SQLite database with sub-millisecond response times. Your app always gets data instantly.
architecture.step2Description: The inactive database quietly syncs fresh data from Airtable in the background. Zero impact on live queries.
architecture.step3Description: Once the refresh completes, databases swap atomically in a single operation. If anything fails, the active database stays untouched — automatic rollback.
architecture.result: Your API never goes down, even during data refreshes. Every request returns consistent, fresh data.

syncModes.title: Three Ways to Stay in Sync
syncModes.subtitle: Choose the sync strategy that fits your use case.
syncModes.pollingDescription: Automatic full refresh at a configurable interval. Simple, reliable, perfect for most use cases.
syncModes.webhookDescription: Real-time updates pushed by Airtable the moment data changes. HMAC-validated for security.
syncModes.webhookBestFor: Live dashboards, collaborative apps, inventory tracking
syncModes.manualDescription: Full control — trigger a refresh only when you decide, via a single API call.
syncModes.manualBestFor: Batch processing, CI/CD pipelines, scheduled workflows

useCases.title: Built for Real Use Cases
useCases.subtitle: Airboost shines wherever Airtable's API limits hold you back.
useCases.highTrafficDescription: Serve Airtable data to thousands of concurrent users without hitting rate limits or throttling.
useCases.dashboardsDescription: Power analytics dashboards with sub-millisecond response times, directly from your Airtable data.
useCases.mobileDescription: Give your mobile app fast, reliable data access with background sync keeping everything up to date.
useCases.ecommerceDescription: Cache product catalogs and inventory from Airtable for instant page loads and seamless shopping experiences.

cta.title: Ready to see the difference?
cta.subtitle: Deploy Airboost in 60 seconds and start serving your Airtable data 240x faster.
